Services

The Helpers Products offers a technology platform for those seeking tutoring services to connect with those seeking to provide tutoring services (“Services”). It enables users to arrange and schedule tutoring sessions with third party providers of such services, including individual tutors, tutoring centers, and tutoring companies. As independent contractors hired by students, Tutors control the methods, materials and all aspects of the lessons. Unless otherwise agreed by Helpers in a separate written agreement with users, the Services are made available solely for users’ personal, noncommercial use.

Students are responsible for selecting the right tutor for their needs. In making hiring decisions, students should review and investigate each tutor's self-reported credentials, education, and experience, as well as ratings from other students. HELPERS DOES NOT GUARANTEE THE SUITABILITY, SAFETY OR ABILITY OF THIRD PARTY PROVIDERS. AS USERS OF HELPERS PRODUCTS, YOU AGREE THAT HELPERS HAS NO RESPONSIBILITY OR LIABILITY TO YOU RELATED TO ANY SERVICES PROVIDED TO YOU BY THIRD PARTY PROVIDERS THROUGH THE USE OF THE SERVICES OTHER THAN AS EXPRESSLY SET FORTH IN THESE TERMS. HELPERS DOES NOT GUARANTEE THE SUITABILITY, SAFETY OR ABILITY OF THIRD PARTY PROVIDERS.

BY USING THE SERVICES, YOU ACKNOWLEDGE THAT YOU MAY BE EXPOSED TO SITUATIONS INVOLVING THIRD PARTY PROVIDERS THAT ARE POTENTIALLY UNSAFE, OFFENSIVE, HARMFUL TO MINORS, OR OTHERWISE OBJECTIONABLE, AND THAT USE OF THIRD PARTY PROVIDERS ARRANGED OR SCHEDULED USING THE SERVICES IS AT YOUR OWN RISK AND JUDGMENT. HELPERS SHALL NOT HAVE ANY LIABILITY ARISING FROM OR IN ANY WAY RELATED TO YOUR TRANSACTIONS OR RELATIONSHIP WITH THIRD PARTY PROVIDERS. TO MAXIMALLY ENSURE YOUR SAFETY AND RIGHTS, BEFORE ALL TUTORING SESSIONS, USERS ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR READING HELPERS’ SAFETY TIPS AND ALL TUTORING SESSIONS SHOULD BE SUPERVISED BY A RESPONSIBLE ADULT IF USERS IS UNDER 18.

You agree that you are willing to pay all costs associated with the services through Helpers, which are due immediately (“Charges”). These costs include but are not limited to: (a) a tutor’s hourly rate as listed; (b) cancellation fees, defined as in the event that users cancels a confirmed tutoring session on Helpers Products’ platform less than a week before the tutoring session takes place, the student needs to pay a cancellation fee of 10% of the session if it is in more than 24 hours but less than a week, and a fee of 20% of the session if it is in less than 24 hours; and (c) the commission arrangement between the Tutor and Helpers, defined as an administrative fee that Helpers receive of 20% (the “Commission Fee”) of each Charge of more than $7.5 that a student makes to a Tutor, a $1.5 in addition to each charge of more than $7.5 that a student makes to a tutor. The amount of the applicable Commission Fee will be communicated to Users in writing but is subject to change at Helpers’ discretion.

The full amount of the Charge is charged immediately following completion of such election to the Student’s authorized payment method and transferred to such Tutor’s account. All payments made are non-refundable. This no-refund policy shall apply at all times regardless of a Student’s decision to terminate usage of Helpers, Helpers’ decision to terminate a Student’s usage, disruption caused to our Services either planned, accidental or intentional, or any other reason whatsoever.

Helpers will facilitate payment of the applicable Charges on behalf of the Third Party Provider, as such Third Party Provider's limited payment collection agent, using the preferred payment method designated in your Account, and will send you a receipt by email. Payment of the Charges in such manner shall be considered the same as payment made directly by you to the Third Party Provider. Charges will be inclusive of applicable taxes where required by law. Charges paid by you are final and non-refundable, unless otherwise determined by Helpers.

As indicated above, Helpers prohibit any business transactions using cash. All payments made by students to Tutors shall only be made through the Third Party Provider that is acknowledged by Helpers.
